noun.description: An exercise involving raising oneself with one's arms by pulling up against a horizontal bar fixed above one's head.
A disposable diaper with an elasticated waistband enabling it to be pulled up and worn like underpants, typically worn by children during potty training.
examples: now she only wears a pull-up at bedtime
he's toddling around in a pair of pull-ups

noun.description: An act of pulling up; a sudden stop.

adjective.description: (of a diaper) having an elasticated waistband enabling it to be pulled up and worn like underpants.
examples: a little boy in a pull-up diaper
